channel.title: Run a private server that is just like the Official Runescape server back in 200
channel.description: Is it possible to run a private server that is just like the Official Runescape server back in 2005-2007? Also a client that runs this server perfectly, just like it was in the official game? If so, please teach me how.

item.title: Run a private server that is just like the Official Runescape server back in 200
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I’m trying to make one right now… but it’s 2008 I think (whatever 508 is)

But yea, no requests for sources sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Run a private server that is just like the Official Runescape server back in 200
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

Zitozu:

Is there no “run out of box” way to do this? Just a server that’s just like Runescape was back then?

No there isn’t, and if there is one, which will never be. It will never be released.

Read full topic

item.title: Run a private server that is just like the Official Runescape server back in 200
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

Your trying to jar a Hyperion or Runesource??? If so that tutorial i gave you may not be accurate. The only servers that i pretty accurate to rs 2005-2006 would be Hyperion and Runesource if you are not going to do much coding i would use PJA(Project Annihilation) Its a good stable base.

Read full topic
